articles.title: OpenAI releases new AI model
articles.summary: OpenAI has announced a new AI model with improved capabilities.
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI宣布推出功能改进的新AI模型。

articles.title: AI industry sees major investment

articles.translated_summary: 风险投资对AI公司的资金投入达到新高。
